Charles Salk (Salkowitz) FBI Files and Correspondence
Charles Salk (Salkowitz) FBI Files and Correspondence
WAG.283
WAG.283

Charles Salk (Salkowitz) was an officer on the New York City Metro Area Postal Workers Union (APWU). This collection contains FBI files on Salk and his correspondence with the FBI and U.S. Representative Lester Wolff concerning those records.

Charles Salk (Salkowitz) was an officer on the New York City Metro Area Postal Workers Union (APWU). This collection contains FBI files on Salk and his correspondence with the FBI and U.S. Representative Lester Wolff concerning those records.

Salk, Charles
This collection contains FBI files on Salk, obtained through the Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) and his correspondence with the FBI and U.S. Representative Lester Wolff concerning those records.
Charles Salk (Salkowitz) was an officer on the New York City Metro Area Postal Workers Union (APWU).
Materials found in repository; provenance is unknown. The accession number associated with this collection is 1950.279.
